      • newHeader

      • login

        @WorkerThread
public void login(@NonNull
                                java.lang.String username,
                                @NonNull
                                java.lang.String password)
                         throws ThingIFException
        Login to the Gateway. Local authentication for the Gateway access. Required prior to call other APIs access to the gateway.
        Parameters:
        username - Username of the Gateway.
        password - Password of the Gateway.
        Throws:
        ThingIFException - Thrown when gateway returns error response.

      • onboardGateway

        @NonNull
 @WorkerThread
public Gateway onboardGateway()
                                               throws ThingIFException
        Let the Gateway Onboard.
        Returns:
        Gateway instance that has ThingID assigned by Kii Cloud.
        Throws:
        ThingIFException - Thrown when gateway returns error response.
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - Thrown when user is not logged in. See login(String, String)

      • getGatewayID

        @WorkerThread
 @NonNull
public java.lang.String getGatewayID()
                                                      throws ThingIFException
        Get Gateway ID
        Returns:
        Thing ID assigned by Kii Cloud.
        Throws:
        ThingIFException - Thrown when gateway returns error response.
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - Thrown when user is not logged in. See login(String, String)

 @NonNull
public java.util.List<EndNode> listOnboardedEndNodes()

      • listPendingEndNodes

        @WorkerThread
 @NonNull
public java.util.List<PendingEndNode> listPendingEndNodes()
                                                                           throws ThingIFException
        List connected end nodes which has not been onboarded.
        Returns:
        List of end nodes connected to the gateway but waiting for onboarding.
        Throws:
        ThingIFException - Thrown when gateway returns error response.
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - Thrown when user is not logged in. See login(String, String)

      • notifyOnboardingCompletion

        @WorkerThread
public void notifyOnboardingCompletion(@NonNull
                                                     EndNode endNode)
                                              throws ThingIFException
        Notify Onboarding completion Call this api when the End Node onboarding is done. After the call succeeded, End Node will be fully connected to Kii Cloud through the Gateway.
        Parameters:
        endNode - Onboarded EndNode
        Throws:
        ThingIFException - Thrown when gateway returns error response.
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - Thrown when user is not logged in. See login(String, String)

      • restore

        @WorkerThread
public void restore()
                           throws ThingIFException
        Restore the Gateway. This API can be used only for the Gateway App.
        Throws:
        ThingIFException - Thrown when gateway returns error response.
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - Thrown when user is not logged in. See login(String, String)

      • replaceEndNode

        @WorkerThread
public void replaceEndNode(@NonNull
                                         java.lang.String endNodeThingID,
                                         @NonNull
                                         java.lang.String endNodeVenderThingID)
                                  throws ThingIFException
        Replace end-node by new vendorThingID for end node thingID.
        Parameters:
        endNodeThingID - ID of the end-node assigned by Kii Cloud.
        endNodeVenderThingID - ID of the end-node assigned by End Node vendor.
        Throws:
        ThingIFException - Thrown when gateway returns error response.
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - Thrown when user is not logged in. See login(String, String)

      • getGatewayInformation

        @WorkerThread
 @NonNull
public GatewayInformation getGatewayInformation()
                                                                 throws ThingIFException
        Get information of the Gateway. When the end user replaces the Gateway, Gateway App/End Node App need to obtain the new Gateway’s vendorThingID.
        Returns:
        Gateway Information.
        Throws:
        ThingIFException - Thrown when gateway returns error response.
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - Thrown when user is not logged in.

        public boolean isLoggedIn()
        Check If user is logged in to the Gateway.
        Returns:
        true if user is logged in, false otherwise.

      • loadFromStoredInstance

        @NonNull
public static GatewayAPI loadFromStoredInstance(@NonNull
                                                         android.content.Context context)
                                                  throws StoredInstanceNotFoundException,
                                                         UnloadableInstanceVersionException
        Try to load the instance of GatewayAPI using stored serialized instance.
        Instance is automatically saved when login(String, String) is called and successfully completed.
        If the GatewayAPI instance is build without the tag, all instance is saved in same place and overwritten when the instance is saved.

        If the GatewayAPI instance is build with the tag(optional), tag is used as key to distinguish the storage area to save the instance. This would be useful to saving multiple instance. You need specify tag to load the instance by the api. When you catch exceptions, please call login(String, String) for saving or updating serialized instance.
        Parameters:
        context - context
        Returns:
        ThingIFAPI instance.
        Throws:
        StoredInstanceNotFoundException - when the instance has not stored yet.
        UnloadableInstanceVersionException - when the instance couldn't be loaded.

      • loadFromStoredInstance

        @NonNull
public static GatewayAPI loadFromStoredInstance(@NonNull
                                                         android.content.Context context,
                                                         @Nullable
                                                         java.lang.String tag)
                                                  throws StoredInstanceNotFoundException,
                                                         UnloadableInstanceVersionException
        Try to load the instance of GatewayAPI using stored serialized instance.
        For details please refer to the loadFromStoredInstance(Context) document.
        Parameters:
        context - context
        tag - specified when the ThingIFAPI has been built.
        Returns:
        GatewayAPI instance.
        Throws:
        StoredInstanceNotFoundException - when the instance has not stored yet.
        UnloadableInstanceVersionException - when the instance couldn't be loaded.

      • removeAllStoredInstances

        public static void removeAllStoredInstances()
        Clear all saved instances in the SharedPreferences.

      • removeStoredInstance

        public static void removeStoredInstance(@Nullable
                                        java.lang.String tag)
        Remove saved specified instance in the SharedPreferences.
        Parameters:
        tag - tag to specify removing stored instance.
